description.ko: AQUA-5 기지가 압도적인 어둠을 밝히는 미드나이트 존의 심장부로 여정을 떠나보세요. 이 영상은 첨단 기술과 심해의 신비로운 발광 생명체들 사이의 조화를 탐구합니다.
description.en: Journey into the heart of the midnight zone where the AQUA-5 station illuminates the crushing darkness. This visual explores the harmony between advanced technology and the mysterious, glowing organisms of the deep sea.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of the futuristic AQUA-5 underwater research station situated in the deep ocean abyss, surrounding by bioluminescent flora and glowing neon marine life, dark navy and electric blue lighting, high pressure atmosphere, hyper-realistic textures, 8k resolution, volumetric lighting, ethereal bubbles.
